recommended_degree: Rekayasa Industri, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak, Rekayasa Teknologi Manufaktur, Teknologi Rekayasa  Manufaktur, Teknologi Rekayasa Elektro (Sarjana)
job_description:
Job Description:
1. Develop lightweight Generative AI chatbots for production data analysis, including predictive maintenance and quality control.
2. Implement on-premise AI/ML solutions integrated with production requirement databases.
3. Collaborate across functions with the supply chain team to align AI-driven solutions with business objectives.

Requirements:
1. Frontend Skills: React.js (including Next.js), Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
2. Backend Skills: FastAPI, PostgreSQL (Database), Data manipulation (NumPy, Pandas)
3. Programing Languages: Typescript, Phyton
4. AI Skills: Transformers (model architecture), Anomalib (Anomaly Detection), Torch (base model, vision model, audio model), Ollama (LLM and LV) // Assuming LV refers to Large Vision models or similar, Cerebras/OpenAI API (AI API), YOLO (Computer Vision), OpenCV (Image annotation), LangChain (RAG & AI Pipeline), SentenceTransformers (RAG), xTTS (TTS model), Whisper (STT model)
5. Tools & Technologies: Git (Version Control), Hugging Face (models repository), Label Studio (data labelling)
